alert.note: Alert for Austin; Colorado; Fort Bend; Inland Brazoria; Inland Harris; Inland Matagorda; Waller; Wharton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 12:29AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Colorado, central Wharton, southeastern Austin, Fort Bend, west central Brazoria, north central Matagorda, southern Waller and southwestern Harris Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1229 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Pattison to 10 miles northwest of Pierce. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sugar Land, Rosenberg, Stafford, Katy, Richmond, Wharton, Sealy, Brookshire, Hunters Creek Village, Bunker Hill Village, Piney Point Village, Spring Branch North, Mission Bend, Town West, Pecan Grove, Eldridge / West Oaks, Spring Branch West, First Colony, Addicks Park Ten and Spring Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Austin; Colorado; Fort Bend; Inland Brazoria; Inland Harris; Inland Matagorda; Waller; Wharton
